T04n847u_001:4: tasmin rāganirākṛtau nahi kathā dveṣakṣaye jāyate
T04n847u_001:5: dveṣasyāpi nirākṛtau nahi kathā rāgakṣaye jāyate || 1 ||
T04n847u_001:6: mānāderapi yat kṣayāya vacanaṃ nānyaṃ malaṃ hanti tat
T04n847u_001:7: tasmādvayāpitaraṃ na tatra ca punastāstā mahārthāḥ kathāḥ |
T04n847u_001:8: mā mohasya parikṣayāya tu kathā kleśānaśeṣānasau
T04n847u_001:10: mohasyāsya parikṣayāya ca yato dṛṣṭāḥ pratītyādaya-
T04n847u_001:11: stattvaṃ tat pratipacca saiva sugataiḥ saṃkīrtitā madhyamā |
T04n847u_001:12: kāyo dharmamayo muneḥ sa ca yataḥ sā śūnyatetyucyate
T04n847u_001:13: buddhānāṃ hṛdayaṃ sa cāpi mahatī vidyeti saṃkīrtyate || 3 ||
T04n847u_001:18: gambhīraṃ jinaśāsanaṃ na hi jano yo vetti tatsaṃvide
T04n847u_001:19: maunīndrād vacasaḥ pṛthaṅnigadituṃ vāñchanti tattvaṃ ca ye |
T04n847u_001:20: anye ye'pi kubuddhayaḥ pravacanaṃ vyācakṣate cānyathā
T04n847u_001:21: teṣāṃ cāpi nirākṛtau kṛtamidaṃ śāstraṃ hatāntardvayam || 5 ||
T04n847u_001:26: āyātāya śiro'rthiṃne karuṇayā protkṛtya dattvā śiraḥ
T04n847u_001:27: saṃyāte tu sukhāvatīṃ jinasute nāgārjune tatkṛtāḥ |
T04n847u_001:28: granthāḥ śiṣyagaṇāśca te'pi bahunā kālena nāśaṃ gatāḥ
T04n847u_001:29: tattvārke'stamite'dhunā na hi mataṃ spaṣṭaṃ tadasti kvacit || 7 ||
T04n847u_001:33: dhanyo'sau kṣaṇamapyapāsya vimatiṃ yaḥ śūnyatāṃ gāhate || 8 ||
T04n847u_001:35: ścittvotplutya ca yāti vastuparikhāṃ caiko mṛgo'sau mahān |
T04n847u_001:36: taṃ pratyadya na cintayā mama guṇaścaikastu yo nādhunā
T04n847u_001:37: taṃ pratyeva tadanyaśāstramathanī vṛttiḥ kṛteyaṃ mayā || 9 ||
T04n847u_001:41: yā cāsāvatha vigrahasya racitā vyāvartinī tāmapi || 10 ||
T04n847u_001:42: dṛṣṭvā tacchatakādikaṃ bahuvidhaṃ sūtraṃ gabhīraṃ tathā
T04n847u_001:43: vṛttiṃ cāpyatha buddhapālitakṛtāṃ sūkṣmāṃ ca yadbhāvinā |
T04n847u_001:52: yatpuṇyaṃ mama śūnyateva vipulaṃ tenaiva loko'khila-
T04n847u_001:55: sambuddhān sakalaṃ jinātmajagaṇaṃ dharmaṃ ca tairbhāṣitam |
T04n847u_001:57: yo'muṃ madhyamakaṃ cakāra kṛpayā nāgārjunastaṃ name || 14 ||
